details:
verb
- to increase the volume of
= example: to increase the volume of
- to exaggerate or make bigger
= example: to exaggerate or make bigger
= synonyms: inflate
- to increase in size, volume or significance
= example: to increase in size, volume or significance
= synonyms: magnify
- to enlarge beyond bounds or the truth
= example: to enlarge beyond bounds or the truth
= synonyms: magnify
